reviewtext: I bought this product for the elph s300 and could not be happier. The card works seemlesly and stores about 125 pictures at maximum 2.1 megapixel resolution. The cost can't be beat,... A nice addition if you have a laptop is a PCMCIA Viking adapter which allows you to plug the compact flash card directly into the computer and use it as a drive. This setup is much faster than any USB download or compactflash card reader and is ideal for digital images.
